law.catch_line: An individual selected or designated to fill a vacancy in candidacy or nomination under this title s...
law.text:
An individual selected or designated to fill a vacancy in candidacy or nomination under this title shall:
file a certificate of candidacy with the appropriate board in accordance with Subtitle 3 of this title; and
unless exempted under this title, pay the filing fee specified under § 5-401 of this title.
